LanguageData.MilkableColonists.breastGrowthDisabledDe: Default: off. Enable to prevent breasts from growing due to milk production or milking. They can still change size due to drugs or other means.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.forceCapMaxBreastSizeD: Default: on. If this is enabled breast size will be capped to the value you set below.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.breastGrowthMaxSizeDes: Default 1. You could make this higher and depending on your mods it might display correctly. Breasts larger than this number will be shrunk to this number. (In case you mess up and need to fix something.)
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.flatChestGivesMilkDesc: Default: off (flat chest has no room for milk production); Enable to have a minimum milk production.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.ignoreReproductiveStag: Default: off. Only enable if you have races where reproductive stage isn't set properly.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.enableDebugLoggingDesc: Default: off. Show milking results in the console.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.enableDebugLoggingMilk: Default: off. Show individual milk gains each tick. Spammy.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.enableMilkDripDesc: Default: on. Drip milk onto the ground when fullness is above 100%
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.enabledMilkDripAmountD: Default 100%: What fullness level is required before milk will start dripping onto the ground.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.enableDebugFillButton: DEBUG: Show Fill Milk debug button
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.enableDebugFillButtonD: Default: off. Show a debug button on pawns to immediately fill their milk amount.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.enableLessInteruptions: Default: on. Milking and Breastfeeding will only stop the other pawn from doing a job if they are moving/sleeping/free. Other jobs should continue uninterrupted.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.adultBreastfeedNutriti: Default 5: The nutrition from breastfeeding is normally very low. It will be multiplied by this amount so your pawns don't starve while breastfeeding. 1 = Baby food amounts.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.fullnessHungerAmount: Breastfeeding: Hunger level required to breastfeed
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.fullnessHungerAmountDe: Default 50%: Adult pawns will not consider breast feeding until their hunger drops below this level. Make it higher to have pawns breastfeed earlier. If set too low they'll probably eat food instead.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.fullnessMilkBreastfeed: Default 100%: Pawns will not be targets for adult breastfeeding until their fullness reaches at least this amount.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.fullnessMilkBottleAmou: Default 120%: Pawns will not be targets for milking into bottles until their fullness reaches at least this amount.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.fullnessMilkSelfAmount: Default 150%: Pawns will not be valid for self milking into bottles until their fullness reaches at least this amount.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.fullnessMilkMachineAmo: Milk Self at Milking Station: Fullness amount required
Default 140%: Pawns will not be valid for self milking at a milking station until their fullness reaches at least this amount.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.workSpeedMultDesc: Default 1: This is a multiplier to speed up the different work that this mod gives. You'll milk more bottles or drink more milk each action. I was getting impatient at how long some things were taking for pawns with large assets.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.breastMilkModifierHydr: Artificial Breasts: Hydraulic: Milk Amount Modifier
Default 50%: In base RJW Hydraulic breasts do not make milk. Updated in MC so they can. You can adjust the percentage they generate vs real breasts here.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.breastMilkModifierBion: Artificial Breasts: Bionic: Milk Amount Modifier
Default 75%: In base RJW Bionic breasts do not make milk. Updated in MC so they can. You can adjust the percentage they generate vs real breasts here.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.breastMilkModifierArch: Artificial Breasts: Archotech: Milk Amount Modifier
Default 125%: In base RJW Archotech breasts make milk the same as regular breasts. Updated in MC so the make slightly more. As these are super high tech I set the slider to go up higher than others.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.lactPermHungerRateOffs: Default 40%: How much faster the hunger bar goes down with the permanent LactMax Hediff.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.lactHeavyPermHungerRat: Default 80%: How much faster the hunger bar goes down with the permanent Hyper-LactMax Hediff.
LanguageData.MilkableColonists.fertilityFactorOverrid: Default 5%: What fertility is set to in the Biotech Lactating hediff.
